messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: This is your RD speaking. Not sure if the CMO or any medical staff have told you this, but please make sure your SUIT SENSORS ARE ON MAX. Because if I find your dead body, I'm not cloning you. I'm making you into one of my pet borgs. To do my bidding which includes bringing me stuff and fixing the station's many problems. Ok? So SUIT SENSOR ON MAX or get borged if I find your body. Choice is yours.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Uwu senpai not the borg suit pwease

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in One big fucky wucky uwu door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Antechamber.
